## Achievements

You  

- [ ] have read the [Syllabus](index.qmd) and understood the course organization and the relations between Data Science Concepts and Data Science Tools
- [ ] have a running R with Positron installation on you computer and can check all marks on the [Checklist Technical Setup](setup.qmd)
- [ ] have done the *git-GitHub dance* and know what the tools are in principle
- [ ] have rendered quarto documents and understood its idea
- [ ] have made your first steps with R
- [ ] have filled out the [Data Science Profile Survey](https://www.google.com/url?q=https://forms.office.com/e/dHvdFusjqV&sa=D&source=editors&ust=1757755614857276&usg=AOvVaw33D-6CLhmImfhw9gVUHyJ1)
